ModulePrefs.title: Facebook Like Box
ModulePrefs.author: Mohamed Abo El-Ghranek
ModulePrefs.description: Get your facebook page on blogger

Module.Content:
<script type="text/javascript">

var prefs = new gadgets.Prefs();
var element = document.getElementById('like_box');
var url = prefs.getString("url");
var styleLD = prefs.getString("style");

element.style.border="none";
element.style.overflow="hidden";
element.style.width="100%";
element.style.height=prefs.getString("height");

var srcL = '//www.facebook.com/plugins/likebox.php?href=' + url + '&width=340px&height=280px&colorscheme=' + styleLD + '&show_faces=true&header=false&stream=false&show_border=false&appId=492409184153294";

element.src=srcL;

   </script>
